recipesJson.name: Pistachio Butterscotch RY4
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
It's not super innovative or new but it is a perfect combination of tried and true flavors. 

RY4 Double is just the most versatile and easiest to use RY4 with a strong woodsy tobacco note with caramel and vanilla it's surely a crowd pleaser. 
 
It pairs really well with the butterscotch-y creamy deliciousness that is FW Butterscotch Ripple and both slot in perfectly with TFA Pistachio.

Sweeten to Taste

Watch the Video Here: 
https://youtu.be/K4r5pl7PiA8
